text: <@U0B9N0HF0> Still trying to unpack this: are you suggesting doing 3D?
<@U0HP6TFNX>  Hey I was talking with <@U02F9CXTL>, one of the options we were thinking of is making a wider category and throwing a few articles/sites together.
Also, some of the articles only have one or two images tied to them, trying to get ideas for imagery/graphics to be displayed
<@U0J6TE0CA>: cool - will I be able to see an example of what you're thinking in that spreadsheet or should we chat

It's hard to explain over chat, but basically we have all these categories (environment, etc). Perhaps condensing a few of these into one experience, so there's less overall options for the space but the ones we do have have more condensed content to show.
If we have 9 screens + kiosk, and only 1 or 2 images it's a bit bare
Interesting. Let's connect first thing Tuesday so I can make sure this perspective isn't missed in the data model deck
